channel.title: Data Storage on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Data Storage on FinanClub

item.title: WDC
item.description: score:72 Chances: Western Digital stock saw a rise after an analyst at Rosenblatt Securities upgraded the shares, citing optimism about memory demand and the company’s pricing power. Evercore ISI analyst initiated coverage of Western Digital with an Outperform rating, indicating positive growth prospects.

item.title: PSTG
item.description: score:12 Chances: Pure Storage’s strong quarterly earnings and sales performance, including a double beat on earnings, indicate a positive outlook for the company’s future. The company’s expansion into the Puerto Rico and Central America market with Empresas Berríos demonstrates its ability to drive business growth and innovation.
